meta.description: Quick character summary of Kerr Avon

content.p: Blake meets Avon onboard the London, where he's busy plotting. Right from the first moment, he's aloof and dismissive.
Avon got banged up for stealing five hundred million credits from the Federation banking system.
content.h2: Reasons Avon is the best character in Blake's 7:

ul.li: Takes the piss out of Blake at every opportunity
Takes the piss out of Vila at every opportunity
Takes the piss out of Tarrant at every opportunity
Perhaps this ought to be just one bullet point

content.p: Avon is part Spock, part Dr. Zachary Smith, part Q, part The Master. He's a man of many parts, basically.

Usually it's a bad sign when your favourite character on a TV show is the one who turfs up and messes everyone's day up. It suggests that you don't like the main cast that much when some berk pitches up, dumps them in a swamp and then spends the rest of the episode laughing at them, it's your idea of a great time.
What Avon effortlessly does is pricks the pomposity of characters every chance he gets.
